page.title: 15TIBBERTON VILLAGERS
page.content: In our area over 40 houses have been built in the last 10 years, mainly in 2 estates. Many copy the Sutherland type built by the Duke's estate. Many commuters move house frequently and village atmosphere tends to be lost. In{14}families interviewed only 2 sons work in farming. Others work at Tibberton, Newport, Wolverhampton and Telford. 6 are retired. 7 wives have jobs. Most shop in Tibberton, and Newport, a few in Wolverhampton and Shrewsbury. Car ownership ranged from 1 to 5 per family. 2 retired people had none. 3 families had holidays in the UK last year, 3 abroad, including Australia. Cooking is by electricity or calor gas as there is no gas supply. All have televisions and washing machines. 3 have video recorders and 2 have microwave ovens.
